block.p: LEAD: The Northwestern Steel and Wire Company said it had reviewed the $22-a-share cash and preferred stock takeover bid from Bennett Lebow and that there were still terms in the bid that must be negotiated. It said any approval was subject to a favorable opinion from its financial adviser, the First Boston Corporation.

The Northwestern Steel and Wire Company said it had reviewed the $22-a-share cash and preferred stock takeover bid from Bennett Lebow and that there were still terms in the bid that must be negotiated. It said any approval was subject to a favorable opinion from its financial adviser, the First Boston Corporation. The bid was valued at about $165 million.
